title: "Probability Theory"

::: callout-note
You can delete everything in here and start fresh.

# Assumptions

Assuming the same data as in the Probability tree, the related probabilities and their sum is calculate using the code below.


::: {.cell hash='01_probability_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_cd06695573aed83bee7f920d6ad2e85d'}

```{.r .cell-code}
#Constants Definition N<-Not, I<-|. so P(B|A) = P_BIA
P_S<-0.3
P_NS<-1-P_S
P_TIS<-0.2
P_NTIS<-1-P_TIS
P_TINS<-0.6
P_NTINS<-1-P_TINS

#Calculation
P1<-P_S*P_TIS
P2<-P_S*P_NTIS
P3<-P_NS*P_TINS
P4<-P_NS*P_NTINS
Sum_of_P<-P1+P2+P3+P4
```
:::


# Results

P(T ⋂ S ) = 0.06

P(T ⋂ !S ) = 0.24

P(!T ⋂ S ) = 0.42

P(!T ⋂ !S ) = 0.28

Sum of all = 1
